org.hswgt.teachingbox.core.rl.experiment

Interface ExperimentObserver

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CartPole2dWindow, CartPoleVisualization, CopyOfTrajectoryPlotter2D, CumulativeRewardAverager, DataAverager, DataRecorder, DelayedDataAverager, DisplayQValuesObserver, DisplayQValuesObserver, DisplayQValuesObserver, DisplayValuesObserver, DoubleMatrix1DAverager, EpisodicCumulativeParameterAverager, EpisodicCumulativeRewardAverager, EpisodicCumulativScalarAverager, EpisodicParameterAverager, EpisodicPathLengthAverager, EpisodicSaver, EpisodicStepAverager, EpisodicTerminalStateDataAverager, MountainCarVisualization, NumberOfActiveNetworkNodesAverager, NumberOfDifferenceNetworkNodesAverager, OptimalActionAverager, PoleBalanceVisualization, PoleSwingUp2dWindow, PoleSwingUpVisualization, PolicyEvaluatorDataAverager, RewardAverager, RuntimePlotter, ScalarAverager, StateTransitionAverager, StepLengthAverager, StepLengthAveragerForEachDimension, StepwiseParameterAverager, TdErrorExceedsThreshold, TrajectoryPlotter2d, TransitionExporter, Visualization, WrapAdjustedStepLengthAverager

    public interface ExperimentObserver
extends Serializable
    The ExperimentObserver will be notified on all important events that occur during an experiment. Also a learner will typically implement this interface.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void update(State s, Action a, State sn, Action an, double r, boolean terminalState)
      This method will be called in every step of the experiment
      void updateExperimentStart()
      This method will be called if the experimetns starts
      void updateExperimentStop()
      This method will be called if the experiments is stopped
      void updateNewEpisode(State initialState)
      This method will be called at if a new Episode starts

    • Method Detail

      • update

        void update(State s,
            Action a,
            State sn,
            Action an,
            double r,
            boolean terminalState)
        This method will be called in every step of the experiment
        Parameters:
        s - State at time t
        a - Action at time t
        sn - State at time t+1
        an - Action at time t+1
        r - Reward for doing action a in state s
        terminalState - True if sn is a terminal state

      • updateNewEpisode

        void updateNewEpisode(State initialState)
        This method will be called at if a new Episode starts
        Parameters:
        initialState - The initial state

      • updateExperimentStop

        void updateExperimentStop()
        This method will be called if the experiments is stopped

      • updateExperimentStart

        void updateExperimentStart()
        This method will be called if the experimetns starts
